strong.span: Welcome to Keene Independent School District

div.div:
We are pleased to inform you that we will provide healthy breakfasts and lunches each day at no charge for ALL students.
Drive-thru window 10:00-12:00 behind Elementary.
AT&T is offering low-cost wireline home Internet service to qualifying households

div.p: Keene ISD is a small 3A district located on US Highway 67 between Alvarado and Cleburne. We have slightly over 1,000 students in Pre-K through 12th grade. The superintendent and staff can be contacted at 817-774-5200.

section.class: elementor-element elementor-element-e46301a elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-top-section

div.p:
Mailing Address
P O Box 656
Keene, TX 76059

Physical Address
3625 East Highway 67
Keene, TX 76059

div.div:
We, the Keene ISD family, are united in our dedication to creating academic excellence
in a positive and nurturing setting that celebrates our uniqueness and diversity.

section.class: elementor-element elementor-element-486a60a elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-top-section

span.br:
The Keene Independent School District (Keene ISD or “District”) is committed to making our content accessible to all members of the public, including those with disabilities. This includes parents, students, employees, and all others associated with our district. If this applies to you, and you would like to provide feedback or report a concern, please contact our Keene ISD Administration office
Keene ISD | 3625 E. Hwy. 67 Keene, TX 76059 | Phone: 817-774-5200 | Fax: 817-774-5400
